mapper.select: select date_format(slide_list.last_scan_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, scanner_type as scannerType, count(*) as amount from slide_list group by date, scanner_type order by date asc
select date as date, scanner_type as scannerType, sum(amount) as amount from scanner_table group by scanner_type, date order by date asc
select date as date, scanner_type as scannerType, sum(amount) as amount from scanner_table where date between #{startDate} and #{finishDate} group by scanner_type, date order by date asc

select date as date, scanner_type as scannerType, sum(amount) as amount from scanner_table where (date between #{startDate} and #{finishDate}) and scanner_type = #{scannerType} group by scanner_type, date order by date asc
